titleStmt.title: Blessedness, or, God and the world weighted in the balances of the sanctuary and the world found too light preached in a sermon at Paule, before the Right Honourable the Lord Major, Aldermen, and commonalty of the city of London, on a thanksgiving-day, for the prosperity of our navy in a conflict with the Spaniard, October 17, 1656 / by Francis Raworth ...
titleStmt.author: Raworth, Francis, d. 1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Maxcy, for John Rothwell ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
